Pattern Library

Error message

  • Notes
  • HTML
  • Info

When to use this component

The select component should only be used as a last resort in public-facing services because research shows that some users find selects very difficult to use.

How it works

The select component allows users to choose an option from a long list. Before using the select component, try asking users questions which will allow you to present them with fewer options.

Asking questions means youâ€™re less likely to need to use the select component, and can consider using a different solution, such as radios.

<!--Error Message-->
<legend>Error Message</legend>
<p>Use an error message when there is a validation error. Explain what went wrong and how to fix it.</p>
<div class="error--message">
    <p style="font-weight:bold;font-size:1.2em;padding: 0;margin-top: 0;">There is a problem</p>
    <p class="error--text"><a href="#">Please select a dropdown option</a></p>
</div>

<div class="fieldset error--box" style="">
    <h3 style="font-weight: bold;">Lorem ipsum dolor sit?</h3>
    <p class="error">Please select from the dropdown</p>
    <select class="input input--select" id="select" name="select" style="border: 3px solid #D32F2F;">
        <option selected="" disabled="">Select an option</option>
        <option value="bart">Bart Simpson</option>
        <option value="homer">Homer Simpson</option>
        <option value="marge">Marge Simpson</option>
        <option value="lisa">Lisa Simpson</option>
        <option value="ned">Ned Flanders</option>
        <option value="bugs">Bugs Bunny</option>
        <option value="7 Dwarves">The 7 Dwarves: Grumpy, Happy, Sleepy, Bashful, Sneezy, Dopey, Doc</option>
        <option value="charlie brown">Charlie Brown</option>
        <option value="snoopy">Snoopy</option>
      </select>
</div>

<div class="error--box">
    <fieldset>
        <legend class="h3">Select all that apply</legend>
        <p class="error">Please select all that apply</p>

        <div class="field__item js-focusable-box">
            <input class="input input--checkbox js-focusable" name="checkbox-answer" value="bacon" id="bacon" type="checkbox">
            <label class="label label--inline venus " for="bacon">Bacon</label>
        </div>
        <div class="field__item js-focusable-box">
            <input class="input input--checkbox js-focusable" name="checkbox-answer" value="olives" id="olives" type="checkbox">
            <label class="label label--inline venus " for="olives">Olives</label>
        </div>
        <div class="field__item js-focusable-box">
            <input class="input input--checkbox js-focusable" name="checkbox-answer" value="wine" id="wine" type="checkbox">
            <label class="label label--inline venus " for="wine">Wine</label>
            <div class="field__other field__block">
                <label class="label reveal" for="other-answer" id="label-checkbox-other-input">Please specify type</label>
                <input id="other-answer" name="other-answer-mandatory" data-qa="other-option" type="text" class="input js-focusable">
            </div>
        </div>
    </fieldset>
</div>

<div class="error--box">
    <label class="text--label" for="text-input">Enter some text</label>
    <p class="error">Please enter more text</p>
    <textarea name="Text" class="textarea textarea-error" cols="40" rows="5"></textarea>
</div>

<!--Success Message-->
<legend>Success Message</legend>
<div class="success--message">
    <p class="success--text">Form is now complete</p>
</div>
